track.name: Soul Fire
comments: Got a ticket to see him in the town of my birth 'Bedford', very excited.
Perry is to dub and reggae what George Clinton is to funk
The whole album (for some reason, not bought by Chris Blackwell) is an absolute MUST, as are most of the Black Ark/t releases.
My personal favourite of His Imperial Madman's solo albums. ('Heart Of The Congos', produced by this particular God, deserves a shout simply because...) Classic with a capital 'Class'.
soul fire...cool name...
legend.
